alert.note: Alert for Cass; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 31 at 10:22PM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS EXTENDED TORNADO WATCH 98 TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING AREAS UNTIL 3 AM EDT SATURDAY IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ADAMS ALLEN IN DE KALB ELKHART HUNTINGTON JAY LAGRANGE NOBLE STEUBEN WELLS WHITLEY IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN CASS MI ST. JOSEPH MI THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBION, ANGOLA, AUBURN, BERNE, BLUFFTON, CASSOPOLIS, COLUMBIA CITY, DECATUR, DOWAGIAC, DUNKIRK, EDWARDSBURG, ELKHART, FORT WAYNE, FREMONT, GARRETT, GOSHEN, HUNTINGTON, KENDALLVILLE, LAGRANGE, LIGONIER, MARCELLUS, MENDON, NAPPANEE, NEW HAVEN, OSSIAN, PORTLAND, ROANOKE, SHIPSHEWANA, SOUTH WHITLEY, STURGIS, THREE RIVERS, TOPEKA, TRI-LAKES, AND WHITE PIGEON.
